channel.title: Help with ip and webclient. Rep++
channel.description: how do i change the ip address to my client and i need help on getting the client onto the internet so other people can play it on a webclient. please help. you can pm or just reply. i have teamviewer an di have as a client and source coruptionx. if you can help it will be greatly appreciated if you would like i will give you co-owner or admin wich ever one you want.

item.title: Help with ip and webclient. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

To change the IP open up your Client folder and open up EGUI or GUI and search for the current IP or hit CTRL - F and search for “IP”, “corruptionx”, “no-ip”, “.org”, or “localhost”.

And honestly I wouldn’t want to be on someones server that doesn’t know how to change the IP on the Client and Source they just downloaded and are now trying to get people to play. Doing 10 minutes of coding doesn’t make it your own server, either. And you can’t rep people btw, so no point trying.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with ip and webclient. Rep++
